name: Ext_R3_Immunization_notGiven
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Immunization.notGiven for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Immunization.notGiven from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Flag for whether immunization was given
element.definition: Indicates if the vaccination was or was not given.
element.comment: `Immunization.notGiven` maps to R4 `Immunization.extension`. To multiple elements in Immunization: (`Immunization.statusReason`, `Immunization.status`, `Immunization.extension`). Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Immunization.notGiven` maps to R4 `Immunization.status`. To multiple elements in Immunization: (`Immunization.statusReason`, `Immunization.status`, `Immunization.extension`). Has no type mapping `status` added a required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/immunization-status|4.0.1`. So is mapped as RelatedTo. `Immunization.notGiven` maps to R4 `Immunization.statusReason`. To multiple elements in Immunization: (`Immunization.statusReason`, `Immunization.status`, `Immunization.extension`). Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Immunization.notGiven is flagged IsModifier
